publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-528 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Lorn and Islands Hospital—That the Parliament expresses its concern at the threatened closure of the Nelson Ward at Lorn and Islands District General Hospital; commends the local petition initiated by Councillor McIntosh; reaffirms its commitment to local provision of health care services for the elderly, and calls upon Lorn and Islands Hospital to carry out full public consultation on the provision of local services. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Kay Ullrich*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr John Swinney*, Alasdair Morgan*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Andrew Wilson*
